column4: hey there i need some help with dual screen on i915mobile card in a toshiba laptop
in my toshiba bios, i had set the feature to not use the LCD if there is a vga attached. Ubuntu  is insisting on turning the lcd on. does anyone know how to change that.?
just press your function key to turn off the lcd if you have one
i cant get that to work. it used to be fn-f5 to cycle through the screens but i cant get that to work
